local_intent: Perceive the goal outline, approach and tightly align to goal_T, then verify pose at goal.
assumptions: goal_T becomes visible within 3 detection attempts
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'Align w.r.t. goal outline and verify pose at goal' phase using DetectObject(goal_T) with retries, ApproachAndAlign(goal_T, tol=0.02, 800ms), and IsAt(goal_T). Values match library bins and mirror GLOBAL_BT semantics.
